h1.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-weight: 400; font-family: DauphinPlain; font-size: 70px; line-height: 90px; text-align: center;

h4.style: margin: 10px 10px 5px; padding: 0px; font-weight: 400; text-align: center; line-height: 18px; font-size: 14px; font-style: italic; font-family: 'Open Sans', Arial, sans-serif;

assistance.h4: "Neque porro quisquam est qui dolorem ipsum quia dolor sit amet, consectetur, adipisci velit..."

h5.style: margin: 5px 10px 20px; padding: 0px; font-weight: 400; text-align: center; font-size: 12px; line-height: 14px; font-family: 'Open Sans', Arial, sans-serif;

assistance.h5: "There is no one who loves pain itself, who seeks after it and wants to have it, simply because it is pain..."
